com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.attack

Class AbstractSpecialAttack

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bermudalocket.smartmobs.attack.AbstractSpecialAttack
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bloat, Chemistry, EnderDance, Flamethrower, Greneggs, Resurrection

    public abstract class AbstractSpecialAttack
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.bukkit.event.Listener
    Represents an abstract special attack. The idea is that an attack class is only instantiated once (when the plugin loads), but can be fired many times. This prevents needless garbage collecting and reinstatiation. During construction, an attack is given a specific Event class to listen to. The creator can then override the this#checkConditions method to fine-tune when this attack should occur.
